subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Margaret Downey/SJ Allophones/WorkWIthOthersCondensed.mp3 
  Uploaded by : itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...> 
  Description : Tonight I tried for a single session, real-time, conversation.  I have cut non-relevant parts.   Arthur answers as follows: OBVIOUSLY.  ARE YOU VULNERABLE? - TALK TO ALL OF YOU. -  HOPE YOU LIKE THE ANSWER.  FOREVER I CARE. - I CAN ARGUE I CAPABLE.  THE ANSWER, YES. - YES. - TELL THEM THEY OWE YOU A DOLLAR FOR YOU HELPING THEM OUT. - BUH BYE. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Margaret%20Downey/SJ%20Allophones/WorkWIthOthersCondensed.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...>
